channel.title: CVE Feed for n/a -- VMware Workstation
channel.description: The latest CVEs for n/a -- VMware Workstation

item.title: CVE-2024-22268|2024-05-14T12:58:50.881Z -- N/A -- VMware Workstation
item.description: VMware Workstation and Fusion contain a heap buffer-overflow vulnerability in the Shader functionality. A malicious actor with non-administrative access to a virtual machine with 3D graphics enabled may be able to exploit this vulnerability to create a denial of service condition.

item.title: CVE-2024-22269|2024-05-14T12:59:28.869Z -- N/A -- VMware Workstation
item.description: VMware Workstation and Fusion contain an information disclosure vulnerability in the vbluetooth device. A malicious actor with local administrative privileges on a virtual machine may be able to read privileged information contained in hypervisor memory from a virtual machine.

item.title: CVE-2024-22270|2024-05-14T12:59:55.158Z -- N/A -- VMware Workstation
item.description: VMware Workstation and Fusion contain an information disclosure vulnerability in the Host Guest File Sharing (HGFS) functionality. A malicious actor with local administrative privileges on a virtual machine may be able to read privileged information contained in hypervisor memory from a virtual machine.

item.title: CVE-2024-22251|2024-02-27T17:35:31.786Z -- n/a -- VMware Workstation
item.description: VMware Workstation and Fusion contain an out-of-bounds read vulnerability in the USB CCID (chip card interface device). A malicious actor with local administrative privileges on a virtual machine may trigger an out-of-bounds read leading to information disclosure.
